report.title: Sick as a Dog
report.author: Wharfrat
report.bodytext: I thought I would try to eat some Calamus after noting that my favorite poet, Walt Whitman, entitled a section of poems 'Calamus.' /n /n Bad idea. I read some experiences online but decided to try it anyway, thinking I had a strong stomach. Bad idea. Bad idea. /n /n My goodness! I have been vomiting for 6 hours now and cannot sleep. /n /n I feel like checking myself into some sick mental health clinic. What the &^$%$ was I thinking!
